lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Money is only meaningful in that it represents human intent.

lenders.name: Bonnie&Emily
lenders.loan_because: we enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Hand-stitched custom-fit all leather footwear

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Small thriving businesses will mean peace and prosperity.  If these small firms are nurtured, it will mean a better quality of life for everyone in the region.
lenders.occupational_info: We manage private equity, develop commerical real estate, and produce energy efficient building materials.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think we should help those who are less fortunate than ourselves

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs! As global citizens we will all prosper by contributing to the entrepreneurial success of those in developing nations.

lenders.name: Mark & Adela
lenders.loan_because: My wife is from Ecuador and we know how hard it is for people in other countries to gain access to credit in order to start a business.  And because we believe in Karmic Money Laundering!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the investments of a foundation that supports equal opportunity education and Adela is a student studying bio-chemistry

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Biological Research Technician

lenders.name: Danica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become self sufficient and elevate them out of poverty. We take so much for granted. I want  to help someone else who wants to help themselves, but is having difficulty accessing the resources to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor in emergency medicine

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: Trying to reset the balance of opportunity for others who have every reason to be successful in their lives. This is especially true for women and girls who remain the single most endangered "species" on earth.
lenders.occupational_info: I have dedicated my life to helping other folks. I work for NGO type organizations within my community locally, nationally and internationally. We are very successful in many ways. Yet, I want to help my neighbor directly, whether it is across the world or not. I am a single women, have never been married. I take my life's joy in making significant relationships with other people. Thank you for making this very personal and simple.

lenders.name: TEEN
lenders.loan_because: StumbledUpon'd Kiva. The very next day I read Deuternomy 15 in the Bible which talks about lending to the needy. Jesus promotes even making loans when there isn't much chance of getting your money back. I think God smiles when He thinks of what's going on via Kiva.

lenders.name: NDSL
lenders.loan_because: This is not the driod you are looking for...
lenders.occupational_info: Beeping alllllllllll the way

lenders.name: kairi
lenders.loan_because: Microfinace will change this world into a better place.

lenders.name: Nolio
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to contribute to a more balanced globe.

lenders.name: Valerie Corey
lenders.loan_because: I am so appreciative of my many blessings and I truly believe we can make the biggest difference by empowering others to help themselves... it's a win/win.  Kiva has made this possible in the simplest, most wonderful way.  They are angels.
lenders.occupational_info: One by one, I work with people via vibrational healing methods (Reiki, EFT, Flower Essences) who wish to connect with their wholeness, oneness and wellness... the WOW within so they may truly recognize their uniqueness.  I am a bridge to the light. within.

lenders.name: Aldina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to work for a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is important to give to others in need whenever possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Dept. of Psychiatry at a major medical school in St. Louis

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: sometimes my idealism overwhelms my cynicism.

lenders.name: stacy
lenders.loan_because: The people on kiva are inspiring.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like to see everyone have a home and food and a quality life. I am blessed to have all this.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired-no longer working at a day to day job, but worked as a nurse helping deliver babies and then as a psychologist--someone who helps people to improve their lives by dealing with the problems in their lives.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I teacher English to High School students at a Charter school.

lenders.name: Judith
Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I think women across the world can improve their economic status and start to achieve economic independence with microlending programs such as Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. Senator's Leadership PAC

lenders.name: Veriria
lenders.loan_because: Because these people have the drive to start up their own businesses and are not afraid to ask for help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a faux-bartender in a cafe.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: even a small amount of money to you or i can make such a difference if it's dstributed properly, by the right organization...

lenders.name: forMandM
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a scientist.  The most interesting thing I have ever done is to work on the development of a machine that can do brain surgery with x-rays.

lenders.name: Trunk Bound Regime
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are two artists who really care about the welfare of other people.  We also want to encourage other musicians like ourselves to get involved in Kiva!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I feel that people like me who live in relative ease & plenty have a responsibility to give back to others in the world who are struggling.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small farm museum, taking care of livestock & crops. I also educate visitors about the way farming was done in my country in the 17th century.

lenders.name: Linda Beck Kuban
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. Lending validates our connectiveness to others.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to walk the walk.
lenders.occupational_info: Parent, writer, world citizen.

lenders.name: emma
lenders.loan_because: My daddy thought I should help other people with some of the money I saved.
lenders.occupational_info: When I am not at home with mommy, I go to kindergarden.

lenders.name: Viva
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world!

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library, loaning people books, and have a small sewing business I run out of my home.

lenders.name: Abbriell
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who work hard to make life better for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Connie S Owens
lenders.loan_because: It is one of the many ways I can help others in far away homes. It is a convenient way for me to be of assist to those who are working as hard as I am at making a living for them and their families. Together we can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a guide for those who seek a spiritual path in order to improve their lives, recovery from addictions, and trauma. By developing a spiritual life the rest of life becomes a bit easier, though it does not eliminate the challenges. I am a teacher, guide and mentor to those who are seeking to change their lives.

lenders.name: Nicolas
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce their consumption of electricity and gas. I like my work because I get to go in the field a lot, and I have a positive impact for my clients and for the environment.

lenders.name: Familia
lenders.loan_because: I actually believe we are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make people buy things by using my creativity.

lenders.name: Ria
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is  to be without and have no one to turn to This is a way of giving back a little  for being so very bless....
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids and to me it is very rewarding to work with  children that is so innocent to the way of the world

lenders.name: Ivica & Sonja
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people.

lenders.name: Min
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the transformative power of microcredit for lifting people out of the cycle of poverty.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the oppertunity to be successful.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life a little at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the manager of a clinic that helps find cures and treatments for diseases.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: Somebody very special gave me as a present a gift certificate and I think it's a wonderful thing. I am  figuring out how the site works and evaluating who to loan to.

lenders.name: Sebastian
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help out others who work hard.

lenders.name: Clara
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world"  --Ghandi

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a hand where I can.  It is just a way to do something very personal to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help big companies understand their customers.  I help they by interviewing customers and uncovering new opportunities.

lenders.name: Jonathan & Kari
lenders.loan_because: I'm impressed by the strength and perseverance of these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to start finding new ways to share the prosperity I enjoy with others. This is a way to find people who are motivated and entreprenurial, but who are not surrounded by opportunity as we are.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an architect and designer of places where informal, intergenerational, and self-directed learning is fostered.

lenders.name: Luis Ventura
lenders.loan_because:
The question should be why not?

Why not?, help another human being forge a better future.

A portion of the money I lend comes from the ad revenue generated by my website Linhost.info.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment I am in college with focus on Information Technology(IT).

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I care about others not just in my community but around the world.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that are in need
lenders.occupational_info: im just a student that wants to help others

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women start their own businesses.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I am a widow with a disabled child - in another country that would make my life extremely difficult. I have the good fortune to live in an affluent country. I loan because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am carer for my disabled son. I also keep dairy goats and teach quiltmaking

lenders.name: Luca B.
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a wonderful and effective strategy to make people help  themselves and share their projects with lenders. I feel better when I loan .
lenders.occupational_info: I am a free lance consultant. I define organisational processes, analyse team performance and train people to manage their projects more efficiently.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Bianca
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important for all women to be independent and self-sufficient

lenders.name: Mary E
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have seen the impact of a loan on a family's future and well being.

lenders.name: Erin and Aaron
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to make an impact in the world and what better way than to provide loans that will help a community be self sustainable.  "Teach a man to fish and he will be able to feed his family for the rest of his life."
lenders.occupational_info: A business man is the best way to describe what I do.  I help buy and sell companies for my clients.  My wife is a surgical nurse.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I can

In may 2008 I received a check for $400 for some work I had completed. I decided to invest half the check into Loans.


email me for more info: Peterseltzer @ Gmail.com
lenders.occupational_info: University Student

lenders.name: Richalle
lenders.loan_because: I do not want to take anything for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I hope in some small way I can help a person out there, even if it is just a little bit, to make his and his family a little bit better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on Jet engines that help  airplanes fly.

lenders.name: Jynell
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs someone to believe in them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse.  I care for children on ventilators.  I also work for a medical equipment company and deal with all things respiratory.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because:
it is in my heart to help anyone I can in any way that I can. It should be in everybody's heart to help one another LIVE! 

FAITH - HOPE -LOVE

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: The business owners are inspiring to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a medical doctor.  Right now I am doing rotations, or on the job training.  In one year I will be done.  I love medicine because it allows me to help people from all walks of life, young and old.  In medicine you are able to provide a very unique service to people that they really appreciate.  It's very rewarding.

lenders.name: Bronwyn
lenders.loan_because: even the smallest loan can combine with other loans and better an entire community.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have worked with small business owners my whole career, and I know how hard they work.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide franchise support to small business owners.

lenders.name: Jordan

lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer.

lenders.name: Beebers119

lenders.occupational_info: I give legal advice to people and companies.

lenders.name: Nessie
lenders.loan_because: Its win-win
lenders.occupational_info: I try to figure out how to kill viruses

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have been born in the First World. The more we help out our fellow man, the more we will all benefit. And I'd want someone to do it for me, were I in their shoes.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for managing the benefits of retired soldiers.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed.

lenders.name: Craig

lenders.name: Mario

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I have a wonderful healthy family.

lenders.name: KAREN B.
lenders.loan_because: I am especially interested in helping people in Vietnam because my mother is from Saigon.  It makes my heart happy knowing that I can help  make a difference in peoples lives!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medications that help people live healthier & happier lives.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I admire the industrious.  It also feels good.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It feels right. We all need extra help sometimes. I had a friend loan me money for a computer. I would not be in business without it. Life is circular.
lenders.occupational_info: I make stationery - wedding invitations, announcements, calling cards and thank you cards. I'm obsessed with paper.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young people to understand the beliefs of others.

lenders.name: hari

lenders.occupational_info: I sell fabric to garment manufacturers

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupation: Multi Functional Copiers, printers, and fax
lenders.loan_because: As a business man myself, I understand the value of needing and being a helping hand.  Faith in human nature is restored everytime my loans are repaid.  And it fascinating to loan to far away places.

I sell and service multifunctional copier systems.
Copy,print,scan,and fax.  I can make placements anywhere in the United States.  I can be reached through my website.

lenders.loan_because: I can like my dad

it's a pleasure to help others to improve the lives of

lenders.occupational_info: Life is enjoyed when you begin to live each day loving yourself and sharing that love with others.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: It's cool, it's fun, it makes a difference

lenders.name: yusher
lenders.loan_because: i need to have this loan because i am a forex trader and i need to have some capital to start trading .
lenders.occupational_info: well my work is very lucrative but it needed a lots of experience  you have to be very well informed befor you jump into it .

lenders.loan_because: To teach

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: improving manufacturing processes

lenders.loan_because: Promoting entrepreneurship through grassroots efforts is one of the best ways to achieve meaningful development. These people have great ambitions and ideas, they just need some modest capital!
lenders.occupational_info: Distributing government subsidies to people with low incomes for heating fuel and electricity (LIHEAP).

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: To help improve access to social determinants of health.

lenders.name: e.
lenders.loan_because: .. many have even less than me to share ..

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: There's a need and I'm able to help.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to live in a place where I have incredible opportunities and lack for nothing.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: someone who i admire greatly gave me a gift certificate. now i find that giving to someone who truly appreciates and needs it just makes me feel really good!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a carpenter. I build everything from cabinets and furniture to houses. I also work with steel and many other types of media. i work with my hands and i feel good when i finish a project. my goals in life are to be successful enough to pass on my knowledge of life to who ever needs it or wants it.

lenders.name: masami
lenders.loan_because: i can't stand it
lenders.occupational_info: amanojack

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people!!

lenders.name: YUKI
lenders.loan_because:
I am excited to have the opportunity to help business
to get better life.

lenders.name: Hiroshi
lenders.loan_because: Every day is the turning point.

It has been supported in one's youth by various people. 
I think that it is the turn that oneself supports from now on.

lenders.name: YOSUKE [tony]
lenders.loan_because:
JUST want to....One for ALL-All for ONE!!　
I feel so good about this N really hope that my little loan can help a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: paint dep.

lenders.name: Yoshiaki
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to be able to help people around the world. It's more personal than supporting a large organization and not really knowing where your money goes. It's a really cool idea and also fun!

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I care about the welfare of my fellow human beings, and see lending as a small yet effective way to help fight poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in school, preparing to attend college in a year. After college I will be trained as an officer in the United States Army.

lenders.name: Nari
lenders.loan_because: I wanna support you.
lenders.occupational_info: Grapical User Interface Designer, Electrical Maker of Japan.

lenders.name: Takayuki
lenders.occupation: Technical adviser for digital photo studio
lenders.loan_because: I hope for the thing that a moving photograph is taken all over the world.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans work.
lenders.occupational_info: I help scientists and engineers obtain and manage the information they need to do their work.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: it takes balls to start a business

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: I believe lending money to people so they can improve their business is a great way to help them to start moving towards a better life.

lenders.name: Akio
lenders.loan_because: I hope my concerns contribute to someone's happiness.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: My sister worked on a family owned coffee plantation in central Nicaragua and learned first hand what a huge difference micro-finance can have on rural communities.  I loan in her memory.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because:
I respect and honor those who want to help themselves to improve the quality of their lives.
I was raised on a farm and as a child it was required to work in the fields, which resulted in a strong personal work ethnic. "Life is not easy" 
Now I would like to give someone and opportunity to enhance their day to day life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Currently I am retired. As a child I was raised on a farm, my siblings and I were required to work in the fields. I was fortunate to receive a scholarship to nursing school. I worked as a surgical nurse, married, and was a stay at home mom for three wonderful  children. 
When my husband was diagnosed with cancer I returned to the nursing profession. I am passionate about being a surgical nurse. 
When I became a widow, I was able to support my children and myself.
Now I enjoy life as a independent mother and grandmother. 
I love the outdoors, hiking, gardening, knitting, reading, cooking and being with friends.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back - especially to women in my adopted country Peru. I had heard of Kiva but the impetus came in the economic stimulus package and the suggestion  from 08Donate.com to use this money to make a difference in the world rather than just buying a new gadget.
lenders.occupational_info: In my day job I am a programmer at the University of Arizona. But I consider my life work to help bring more justice and opportunity in the world.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world $25 at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Episcopal priest in the Diocese of Chicago.

lenders.name: Brandi
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to other people.

lenders.name: Hiroyuki
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: advertising

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping other people. I am very grateful for everything I have because I know that people everywhere everyday struggle to make a living. For some people, they have to struggle to survive. Being a grateful person for everything that I've been blessed with, I believe this isn't just about giving, this is about human life and bringing the world closer together.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: Buying parts for airplanes

lenders.name: KIM SHIN
lenders.loan_because: A little contribution make great start and improve lives better.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I believe a loan is empowering. Welfare is not.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an information technology manager and a part-time soldier. I am also a deist, transhumanist, weapons enthusiast and avid video game player. I build my own computers and I am a photographer. I am trying to teach myself to play guitar and I enjoy writing.

lenders.name: Yu Yatani
lenders.loan_because:
Money is like manure.
 It only does any good if you spread it around.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet and website consultant .

lenders.name: Miles
lenders.loan_because: I  loan  because  the money will help  people   in less  fortunate  Countries
lenders.occupational_info:
Some day i want to work  for  a  Non
Governmental   Organization  as a professional  Fund  Raiser

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the idea of helping one person accomplish a goal of improving his or her life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired librarian. I worked in a science museum and helped people find the books and information they need in their scientific research.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I like the Kiva philosophy, how small contributions made by many can change a life.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I am continuing my father's loans in his honor. This organization was very important to him and I am sure he would want us to continue loaning and spreading the word about Kiva even though he is not able to anymore.

lenders.name: Nazim
lenders.loan_because: I am miserable of being so materialistic in this superficial existence of mine.   If I can imagine a smile on someone's (who lives in such dire circumstances) face for even a fraction of a second, that's a blessing from a poor soul which genuinely touches one's heart.
lenders.occupational_info: I service pcs and laptops for a mid size company

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's an ideal opportunity to help someone quickly and directly.  I can't afford to make a large loan, but I'm glad to be able to help someone for whom $25 is a big help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach piano and clarinet to students of all ages.  I try to help them find the joy in playing and give them an appreciation for music whether or not they decide to make a career out of it.

lenders.name: Marcelo
lenders.loan_because: we can help/trust people.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how hard it is to keep a business running without funding.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and manage a custom skincare boutique. I help women with skin sensitivity and skin conditions find products that are effective in the treatment of their skin.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others fulfill their dreams to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Electa
lenders.loan_because: This was a mother's day present from my son

lenders.name: Yeshua
lenders.loan_because: I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: fisher of men

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I am in the International Baccalaureate program at my high school, and one of the things that we do in this program is create a project that benefits someone or the community. My project is to make bracelets & such that I can hand out and collect donations to send (through Kiva) to entrepreneurs in third world countries. I feel that this is the perfect opportunity to make a significant difference in the lives of people that do not have as many opportunities as we do in America.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It can change the world

lenders.name: Melly
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed and hope that I can bless some others around the world.  I LOVE the idea of this program - I think it is fabulous!
lenders.occupational_info: I design patterns for toys, bags and quilts.  These patterns are then wholesaled to craft stores around the world.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales rep for a women's footwear company.

lenders.name: Renee & John
lenders.loan_because: Life has been very good to us and we believe in "paying it forward."  Every small act of kindness and generosity is a step towards a better and more just world.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because:
I grew up very poor and know what it is like to struggle just for the basics. Through much generosity from organizations locally, I was able to go back to school and get my current job which pays well enough that we can actually keep food in the house and the heat running. 

I loan because it is my way of paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
I listen to medical reports dictated by doctors on the patients they see throughout the day and transcribe or type them up on the computer for their records.

I'm also working on being more active in the theatrical and film community. (My photo is from the Bristol Renaissance Faire where I am in my 10th season performing.)

Whenever I can I like to sew quilts and do needlework and to perform in plays with my children.

lenders.name: armina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make computers and people understand each other better

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: I know how life-changing a helpful hand can be, no matter how small the gesture.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get and stay healthy.

lenders.name: faye & cid
lenders.loan_because:
We'll be very happy if our little help will be valuable 
to those who want tomorrow to be an improvement on today.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: As little as I might have, there are always people struggling to get anywhere near my quality of life. It's humbling.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean houses for others who are too busy with families or work to do so themselves.

lenders.name: YUYU
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that the money is actually doing some good, while the same money would not.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: I have a wonderful life, full of love and giving.  This should be passed on to those not so fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people to achieve their life goals.

lenders.name: Lainey
lenders.occupation: Office Manager for a construction company

lenders.name: elianny
lenders.loan_because: You can help so much by lending a small amount

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: in helping to make a positive difference in the lives of others, our own lives are enriched in the process.  We create the future by our actions in the present.
lenders.occupational_info: I issue U.S. patents to inventors and entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something good and decided to raise money for a charity because it seems like a very well thought out charity, I like it that you can keep loaning money out to people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in 8th grade in school.

lenders.name: claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an HIV/AIDS doctor.

lenders.name: Masahiro
lenders.loan_because: I was helped by many people.

lenders.name: Annrachelle
lenders.loan_because: Like most Americans, I have been blessed with a great many opportunities, and I would like to give opportunities to others who have a dream and need just a little helping hand to achieve it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Latin to students in an International Baccalaureate high school.  They learn to love Catullus, dread Horace, and tolerate Vergil.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: This was the first time I could honestly say there will be a direct and immediate impact. In all honesty, I wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an advocate. People have very basic needs and find themselves in situations that are privately discouraging. I help people during those times with counseling.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: This seems like the most direct and positive way to make a meaningful impact on the quality of someone else's life. And, knowing a little about the people I'm helping is very gratifying.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university in the area of mass communication, and am interested in helping students learn the role of media in a democracy and how the media impact our lives.

lenders.name: Sarah, Aidan and Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Tsuyako
lenders.loan_because: I want to make friends from many nations and cooperate in the economic independence of them.

lenders.name: BP Solar
lenders.loan_because:
...and he who has deserved to drink from the ocean of life deserves to fill his cup from my little stream.

Assume no weight of gratitude, lest you lay a yoke upon yourself and upon him who gives.

Rather rise together with the giver on his gifts as on wings...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people put solar systems on their houses. They can generate their own electricity, which is clean and helps clean the planet.

lenders.name: Annemiek Smit
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on testing computers to make sure they're working.

lenders.name: Nadeem & Atiya
lenders.loan_because: We give to others cause God has asked us to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: Self-employed (Entrepreneurs).

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I hope that it will help fight poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office at a school. My job is to help students find the support that they are looking for.

lenders.loan_because: it helps communities and promotes entrepreneurs.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people become fully alive in the Way of Jesus.

lenders.name: Courtney

lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to...I loan because I get more from giving than receiving...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Marketing & Public Relations for a mineral makeup company.  I get a chance to make women feel beautiful everyday...everyone deserves to feel that way, no matter financial standing or geographic location,

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I loan because people lack the help that they require.
lenders.occupational_info: I study at school.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I seek to follow in the footsteps of the religious revolutionary who said to love your neighbor as yourself.

lenders.name: NicheProf
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist others to achieve their hopes and dreams, because, I agree with Price Pritchett that "If you must doubt something, doubt your limits"
lenders.occupational_info: I teach others in and out of a classroom how they can begin to earn a living by connecting with others to form groups of people that can achieve things together that they could not on their own.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur and want the best for everyone. It's a pleasure to support others. I often can't donate much but Kiva makes it possible for just a little money to have a big impact. Thank you!

lenders.name: alanzain
lenders.loan_because: Sharing with people is most beutiful things in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm part time designer.

lenders.name: Jennifer

"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world."
- Anne Frank
lenders.occupational_info: Please feel free to join our lending team!!! see below
